seo.title: Manarola Things to Do 2025 | Activities & Experiences
seo.description: Best activities in Manarola: swimming, wine tasting, sunset watching, boat tours, and exploring the Via dell'Amore.

body.title: Things to Do
body.subtitle: From wine tasting in ancient vineyards to swimming in crystal waters, Manarola offers unforgettable experiences in the most scenic setting.

features.title: Watch the Sunset
features.description: Join locals on the harbor rocks for the most spectacular sunset in Cinque Terre.

features.title: Wine Tasting
features.description: Sample Sciacchetr√† dessert wine in the village where it's produced. Visit local cantinas.

features.title: Swimming & Diving
features.description: Swim in crystal-clear waters, jump from rocks, or snorkel around the harbor.

features.title: Photography Tours
features.description: Capture the iconic colorful houses from the best viewpoints. Morning and sunset tours.

features.title: Boat Excursions
features.description: See the village from the sea. Full-day tours connecting all five villages.

features.title: Food Experiences
features.description: Cooking classes, focaccia making, and pesto workshops with local chefs.
